item.description:
*********************************************************
ALERT! PLEASE NOTE NEW TIME
WE ARE MEETING FROM 7-9pm ON SATURDAY NIGHT MAY 10TH.
SORRY FOR ANY INCONVENIENCE
*********************************************************

Dear Boston Karaoke Members,

It's time to get together once again for our monthly Karaoke get together. If you had fun last month or if you missed it because you were busy, now is your chance to get in on the fun.

We have a great group that is very kind to all participants. If you've been to a previous session, please join us again. If you are thinking about coming for the first time, you won't regret it.

Please RSVP early if you can. See you there.

-Phil
item.how_to_find_us: Ask Doorman for Boston Karaoke Meetup or call me on my cell phone 617-429-6571.
item.why: You'll get to sing your favorite song or listen to others having great fun.
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - May 2008 Meeting
